features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing real-time sales summary, order counts, low stock alerts, staff attendance status, sales trend charts, and quick action buttons for navigation

features.name: POS System
features.description: Point of Sale system with menu display, cart management, modifier selection, forced drink upselling, discount application (0-20%), order types (takeaway/GoMamam), phone validation (+673 Brunei format), receipt printing, and order queue management

features.name: Menu Management
features.description: CRUD operations for menu items, category management, modifier group configuration with required/optional options, extra pricing for modifiers, and item availability toggle

features.name: Kitchen Display System
features.description: Real-time order display for kitchen staff with status updates (pending → preparing → ready → completed), order timers, and audio notifications

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Stock item management with categories (Protein, Staple, Condiment, etc.), unit tracking, minimum quantity alerts, stock adjustments with reason logging, and supplier association

features.name: HR Management
features.description: Staff profile management, attendance tracking with PIN and photo verification, KPI scoring system with tier rankings (S/A/B/C/D), payroll generation with TAP/SCP statutory deductions for Brunei, shift scheduling, and leave/claim approvals

features.name: Staff Portal
features.description: Employee self-service portal with personal schedule viewing, opening/closing checklists with photo proof, leave application and balance tracking, expense claims submission, payslip viewing, profile management, training modules, and shift swap requests

features.name: Delivery Hub
features.description: Multi-platform delivery order aggregation from Grab, FoodPanda, and Shopee with kanban-style order board, status progression, audio notifications, delivery slip printing, and driver information display

features.name: Finance Module
features.description: Expense tracking with categorization (rent, utilities, supplies, wages, etc.), daily cash flow management with opening/closing balances, and profit & loss report generation

features.name: Customer CRM
features.description: Customer database with loyalty points system, customer segmentation (new/regular/VIP), order history tracking, and birthday tracking

features.name: Promotions
features.description: Promo code creation with discount types (percentage, fixed, BOGO, free item), date range validity, usage limits, applicable item selection, and day/time restrictions

features.name: Production Module
features.description: Oil tracker for fryers with cycle counting, change date tracking, production logs, and waste tracking

features.name: Recipe Management
features.description: Recipe definitions with ingredient costing and profit margin calculations

features.name: Supplier Management
features.description: Supplier profiles and purchase order management

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Business intelligence dashboards with sales analytics, performance metrics, and reporting

features.name: Audit Log
features.description: Records critical user actions for compliance and security tracking

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Notification center for alerts, announcements, and system messages

features.name: Settings
features.description: System configuration including receipt designer, business info, language settings, and theme customization

features.name: Internationalization
features.description: Multi-language support with English and Bahasa Melayu translations

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Dark/light mode toggle with persistence

features.name: PWA Features
features.description: Progressive Web App with offline caching, service worker registration, and installability

features.name: WhatsApp Integration
features.description: WhatsApp messaging for order receipts, order ready notifications, low stock alerts, and daily summaries

features.name: Export Services
features.description: PDF report generation and Excel/CSV export for orders, inventory, attendance, and expenses

features.name: Authentication
features.description: PIN-based authentication for clock in/out and role-based access control (Manager/Staff)
